relatedBlades.title: Certifications and compliance resources
relatedBlades.subtitle: Learn about Cloudflare's adherence to industry-standard security compliance certifications and regulations.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare was built to help you and your customers be more secure on the Internet. Learn about the certifications and compliance programs that help us preserve security and privacy.

features.title: ISO 27001:2013
features.description: ISO/IEC 27001:2013 is an industry-wide accepted information security certification that focuses on the implementation of an Information Security Management System (ISMS) and security risk management processes. Cloudflare has been ISO 27001 certified since 2019 and the certificate is [available to download](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/compliance-docs) from the Cloudflare dashboard.

features.title: ISO 27701:2019
features.description: ISO/IEC 27701:2019 is a new ISO privacy certification, implementing a comprehensive Privacy Information Management System (PIMS) aligned with various privacy regulations including the GDPR. Cloudflare has been ISO 27701 certified as a PII Processor and PII Controller since 2021  read our blog below to learn more.

features.title: ISO 27018:2019
features.description: ISO/IEC 27018:2019 is an international privacy certification that extends an Information Security Management System (ISMS) to protect personal data when being processed in a public cloud. Cloudflare has been ISO 27018 certified since 2022 and the certificate is [available to download](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/compliance-docs) from the Cloudflare dashboard.

features.title: FedRAMP Moderate
features.description: Cloudflare maintains FedRAMP Moderate Agency authorization, allowing federal agencies to adopt Cloudflare's performance, security and Zero Trust solutions. Cloudflare for Government has been FedRAMP Authorized since 2022. For more information on Cloudflare's FedRAMP authorization, visit the FedRAMP marketplace

features.title: SOC 2 Type II
features.description: Cloudflare has undertaken the AICPA SOC 2 Type II certification to attest to Security, Confidentiality, and Availability controls in place in accordance to the AICPA Trust Service Criteria. Cloudflare's SOC 2 Type II report covers security, confidentiality, and availability controls to protect customer data and is [available to download ](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/compliance-docs)from the Cloudflare dashboard.

features.title: PCI DSS 4.0
features.description: Cloudflare maintains PCI DSS Level 1 compliance. Cloudflare's Web Application Firewall (WAF), Cloudflare Access (ZTNA), Content Delivery Network (CDN), API Shield (API Gateway), Browser Isolation, Gateway, Magic Firewall, Magic WAN, Magic Transit, Page Shield, Pages, Cloudflare Tunnel, Turnstile, Time Service, Workers, and Workers KV are PCI compliant solutions. Cloudflare's Attestation of Compliance is [available to download](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/compliance-docs) from the Cloudflare dashboard.

features.title: Global Cross-Border Privacy Rules
features.description: The Global Cross-Border Privacy Rules (Global CBPR) system allows participating organizations to demonstrate compliance with internationally-recognized data protection standards, as a data controller. Cloudflare will certify to the Global CBPR system when organizations can be certified later in 2024.

features.title: Global Privacy Recognition for Processors
features.description: The Global Privacy Recognition for Processors (Global PRP) system allows participating organizations to demonstrate compliance with internationally-recognized data protection standards, as a data processor. Cloudflare will certify to the Global PRP system when organizations can be certified later in 2024.

features.title: EU Cloud Code of Conduct
features.description: The EU Cloud Code of Conduct is an officially approved GDPR Article 40 Code of Conduct. Adherence to the code means that Cloudflare commits to implementing data protection policies and security measures that align to the GDPR. Cloudflare services are verified compliant with the EU Cloud CoC, Verification-ID: 2023LVL02SCOPE4316. For further information, please visit [https://eucoc.cloud/en/public-register](https://eucoc.cloud/en/public-register).

contentfulAsset.description: EU Cloud Code of Conduct logo

features.title: Cyber Essentials
features.description: Cyber Essentials defines a set of security controls and guidance on cyber security for organisations of all sizes, developed by the United Kingdom's National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC). Cloudflare is Cyber Essentials certified and our certificate can be found [here](https://registry.blockmarktech.com/certificates/18a45f73-92ac-4db0-b00b-717a9e8c57e2/).

features.title: C5:2020
features.description: Cloud Computing Compliance Criteria Catalogue (C5:2020) is an auditing standard created by Germany's Federal Office for Information Security (BSI). The C5 standard ensures cloud service providers adhere to a baseline of information security criteria. The C5 report covers security controls to protect customer data and is [available to download](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/compliance-docs) from the Cloudflare dashboard.

features.title: BSI Qualification
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized by the German government's Federal Office for Information Security as a qualified provider of DDoS mitigation services. Download this qualification to learn more.

features.title: WCAG 2.1 AA and Section 508
features.description: Cloudflare's dashboard completes Voluntary Product Accessibility Template (VPAT) in compliance with international standards set forth by the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 AA and in conformance with legal standards set forth by Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act.

features.title: 1.1.1.1 Public DNS Resolver Privacy Examination
features.description: On April 1, 2018, we took a big step toward improving Internet privacy and security with the launch of the 1.1.1.1 public DNS resolver - the Internet's fastest, privacy-first public DNS resolver. Cloudflare conducted a first-of-its-kind privacy examination by a Big Four accounting firm to determine whether the 1.1.1.1 resolver was effectively configured to meet Cloudflare's privacy commitments. See below for more information.
